```{r include = FALSE}
library(tibble)
library(ggplot2)
```




```{r df_creat}
set.seed(123)

df_demonstration =
  tibble(
    x = rnorm(n = 1000, mean = 9, sd = 5),
    y = 3 * x + 12 + runif(n = 1000, min = 2, max = 10)
  )
```




```{r making_a_plot}
ggplot(df_demonstration, aes(x = x, y = y)) + geom_point()
```

The mean is `r mean(df_demonstration$x)`.
